attributes.additional_details: It is vital that the Prime Minister sacks Sir David Nicholson inlight of the debacle that has become the NHS under his leadership. The man is not fit to lead the NHS and in order to restore the publics faith in our NHS he has to go or David Cameron could fin that this NHS debacle sinks his relection propsects.

rejection.details: Please see: Sir David Nicholson to resign over NHS failings
